Header.description: Header text for the credential section
Header.instructions:
Act as a marketing strategist. Write a short title that emphasizes the guarantee that we offer. Alternatively, use one of the company certifications or awards. Avoid the use of the same keywords twice. Max 4 to 5 words. 
 Example to follow: 
 A service you can trust.
 Proud to be Osha certified.
 Sparkling Results Guaranteed
 Happy Guarantee
 100% Satisfaction Guarantee

Body.instructions:
Act as a marketing strategist. Write a short paragraph (2 to 3 sentences) about our guarantee, certification, or awards. Avoid the use of the same keywords twice. Do not use the third person, but use the second-person pronoun.
 Example to follow: Our awards speak for themselves â€” we've been recognized by some of the biggest names in the industry, like HomeAdvisor. If you're not satisfied with the results of our services, we offer a 100% money-back guarantee.

Badges.instructions:
Use available badges to create the credential array. The badges available are: 
 bbb-logo.svg (Better Business Bureau), home-advisor-top-rated.svg (Home Advisor Top Rated),wool-safe-badge.png (Wool Safe Certification),IICRC-logo.svg (IICRC Certification), home-advisor-screened-logo.png (Home Advisor Screened),home-advisor-elite-service.svg (Home Advisor Elite),IWCA-logo.svg (International Window Cleaning Association) 

 Display ONLY the certifications mentioned by the client.
